body.name: Stanley AeroLight Transit Bottle, Vacuum Insulated Tumbler for Coffee, Tea and Drinks with Ultra-Light Stainless Steel
body.stockDetail: Only 6 left in stock (more on the way).
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 26 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: SUPERIOR THERMAL PERFORMANCE: With vacuum insulated double walls, drinks stay hot for 4 hours, cold for 6 hours, and iced for up to 20 hours. Available in 12oz, 16oz, and 20oz to make the last sip of water, coffee, or tea as good as the first.

PORTABILITY REDEFINED: Optimized for your commute, the AeroLight Transit Bottle is the ultimate travel companion. It’s made with Stanley’s featherweight spun-steel technology, making it 33% lighter than our standard stainless steel drinkware

NO MORE LEAKS: You’ll love the locking, drink-through lid that keeps leaks at bay. Looking for a stainless steel water bottle to keep by your side as you drive? The slim profile slips into most car cup holders to keep you hydrated on the road.

SAME LEGENDARY DURABILITY: Discover next-level portability with iconic Stanley ruggedness. This vacuum insulated coffee tumbler is made of dishwasher-safe, BPA-free, 18/8 stainless steel; the same material used on our legendary mugs.

LIFETIME WARRANTY: Over 100 years in the making, Stanley products epitomize decades upon decades of reliability; legendary quality that is backed by a lifetime warranty. Go ahead, get a life-proof travel bottle you can count on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hot For Hours and Truly Leakproof!!
reviews.reviewText: I’m totally in love with this tumbler. I take coffee in the morning to work. I pour it around 7:30 and typically still have a bit around 1:30 to finish off (20 ounce tumbler). It’s still warm at that point. I have the pale blush color and was worried the coffee dribbles would stain it since it is so light colored. Not at all!! I would definitely buy more colors. The quality is exceptional. I was looking for a tumbler that would not only keep my coffee hot (a must), but would also be leakproof. I tested this out by tipping it every which way over the kitchen sink. Not a single drop came out! It is a skinny tumbler and fits in my car cup holder perfectly. It has a no skid rubber bottom and doesn’t tip over or slide around. I am completely sold on this tumbler and couldn’t be happier with my purchase!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome coffee mug!!!
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the best coffee mugs I have ever purchased. It keeps the temperature of hot coffee or hot tea for over 4 hours. It’s slim and fits perfectly in my car’s cup holder and in my tote’s side pocket. I highly recommended it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Truly the most tight seal
reviews.reviewText: Feels good in my hand (my hands are small), travels well, truly leak proof, keeps cold cold. Haven't tried hot. Slides intoy up purse easily. Take it every where with me. Sturdy. Money well spent .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Serves it’s purpose
reviews.reviewText: My daughter wanted to give me the Quencher just like hers but I’m a coffee person so I’m trying this. I actually have the StanleyxStarbucks coffee tumbler for 2 years now before all this Stanley hoopla but haven’t used it yet since I thought it’s only for cold drinks and it’s just 16oz (need at least 20oz coffee in the morning). Anyways, my first time using this at this moment I’m writing this review and I like it. It’s slim, perfect for my short fingers. Love the mouthpiece where I can rest my lips without worrying the area is exposed to any possible dust or dirt and the flip goes all the way to the back without flipping back to your nose. Easy to clean w a bottle brush. Keeps hot for hours Hopefully this will be better w my many Starbucks coffee tumblers that the flips breaks all the time. I loved my Starbucks coffee tumblers since the inside lining doesn’t scuff after multiple use w hot drinks, doesn’t leak and keeps hot drinks for hours but just the flips keeps on breaking and they're un replaceable. And hopefully the ring inside won’t loosen like my Hydroflask coffee tumbler before. I just wished this comes w Cherry red color. Thank you Amazon for shipping it w a box and a bubble wrap inside. I was skeptical after reading many reviews of them receiving w dents. I’ll give my follow up review if things will turn out opposite from what I expected from this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really like this bottle for everyday use, I use it for my coffee in the mornings and it keeps warm for hours. When I ordered it it came with a small dent, but I did get a used one and I don’t really mind it. It is also very sleek and fits well in the small cup holder on my backpack. My only gripe is that it is a little on the expensive side, so i would get a used one if you don’t mind any small dents/scratches. Other than that it is a very high quality bottle and I use it all the time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps my coffee hot and looks great doing it!
reviews.reviewText: I’m fat too old to be on the Stanley bandwagon, but I will say that I love my little commuter mug. It keeps my coffee hot for hours, is not too big or too small and I love the color too! I have a Yeti mug, but it doesn’t fit in my cup holder. This Stanley one fits perfectly. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Truly Lightweight Perfect for Travel
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this Stanley Aero-Light transit bottle for ease of transport, but I have found that it also keeps my cold drinks cold for many hours without being a heavyweight and does not leak during transport. I have been using a very heavy 32-oz Hydro Flask wide mouth bottle for a couple of years, which I LOVE except for the weight when I travelled. I couldn't find a place to store the large Hydro Flask in my car where it wouldn't roll around or my grandkids wouldn't hurt themselves with Gigi's heavy water bottle. This Stanley Aerolight Transit Bottle has answered my needs. It is lightweight, doesn't leak or spill all over me when the car or train are moving, and it keeps the ice water cold. I love the ease of carrying it in my backpack or storing it in a cup holder. Although I still LOVE my 32-oz Hydro Flask, this Stanley Aerolight Transit Bottle in the Grapefruit color is working out GREAT! I first saw it advertised on Good Morning America in 2023 and made my purchase because of their recommendations. I am pleased with my purchase and highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Really nice bottle Amazon packaging not so much.
reviews.reviewText: I really like this bottle from Stanley grate size keep thing hot and cold, however upon removing it out of the plastic envelope that it was shipped in with no sort of packaging protection from Amazon I saw that it had a significant dent and chip on the bottom of the cup that caused it not to stand up properly. I have seen so many reviews with this same problem and still Amazon can’t seem to fix this issue. I have ordered several other Stanley cups and they are well packaged in rapping paper and a box (no damage) see pic in photos.
Excelente termo, bonito diseño, mantiene por largos periodos las bebidas calientes, sin duda le doy ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Hermoso termo. Llegó en perfecto estado
La marca es buena, el diseño y color corresponde
Es de poco menos de medio litro, muy buena calidad

Me gustan las bebidas frías y las mantiene así por muchas horas. Tiene un diseño elegante y la apertura de la tapa es muy cómoda al momento de tomar tu bebida. Lo único malo fue que le pegaron un sticker y no se quitó tan fácilmente. Tuve que comprar un artículo que se llama Goof Off que me ayudó a eliminar el sticker y su mancha.
